nodes.text: Risha Synata's ship was a starship owned by and dedicated to the Frenk Actress Risha Synata. It had a gold and dark-red color scheme alongside geometric decorations.

The ship contained a high-ceilinged open-space hangar bay, completed with a massive statue of the actress. Exhibits of non-sentient life-forms, including Opee sea killers in water and gundarks accompanied by exotic fauna also existed, connected to Synata's reception hall by lavish corridors filled with overhead plantations, portraits of the women, large framed posters of her many potrayals and rickshaw services. There was also a casino and a theater onboard the vessel. Many rooms, Padmé Amidala's guest room in particular, had view ports that looked out to space. The guest room and reception hall were both embellished with sizable organically-shaped, golden plates that bore the Aurebesh letters  and , coinciding with the initials of "Madam Synata."

Notably, a museum of galactic history (albeit with disputed accuracy) also existed. Named "Madam Synata's Genius of A Thousand Faces Museum," the showcase was acted out by replicas of the Frenk with other automatons, including depictions of senators Sheev Palpatine, Padmé Amidala, Jedi Bolla Ropal, Kit Fisto, Mace Windu, Obi-Wan Kenobi and two members of Yoda's species. The museum also contained dioramas of the planets Ando Prime, Naboo, and Tatooine, a diner similar to Dexter Jettster's, and an Ewok village.

Beyong the public façade, however, the ship contained a dull and metallic viewing deck devoted to the cause of the Confederacy of Independent Systems. A functional area that served as a remote droid-control center also existed. Numerable LEP servant droids acted as servants.

After the Senate Hostage crisis, Risha Synata, by the orchestration of Count Dooku, invited a number of senators unconvinced of joining the Separatists, including Padmé Amidala, to one of the famous parties she held on her ship. The actress intended to gas such guests in order to advance her goals of presenting history through her plays to Dooku's favor.

Padmé Amidala, alongside her entourage, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, eventually arrived at the venue, located at Caamas of the Cirius system at the time. During their visit, Madam Synata intended for Gastum to open her museum for a private tour for the two guests.
